verses.name: Numbers 32:33
verses.text: And Moses gave unto them, even to the children of Gad, and to the children of Reuben, and unto half the tribe of Manasseh the son of Joseph, the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, and the kingdom of Og king of Bashan, the land, with the cities thereof in the coasts, even the cities of the country round about.

verses.name: Numbers 32:34
verses.text: And the children of Gad built Dibon, and Ataroth, and Aroer,

verses.name: Numbers 32:35
verses.text: And Atroth, Shophan, and Jaazer, and Jogbehah,

verses.name: Numbers 32:36
verses.text: And Beth–nimrah, and Beth–haran, fenced cities: and folds for sheep.

verses.name: Numbers 32:37
verses.text: And the children of Reuben built Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Kirjathaim,
